info.author: Andreas Zeidler
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Zope Public License
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
*How far would you go to become someone else?* |---|
In late 2000's Planet CMS, Mr. Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to
Plone to retrieve a rich and spoiled millionaire deployment, named Archie
Typo.  But when the errand fails, Ripley kills the installation and begins
to assume his life.

  .. |---| unicode:: U+2014  .. em dash


Introduction
------------

This package provides a simple way to replay requests made to a web server,
for example an existing Zope/Plone site, to another Zope/Plone site.  It has
a slight speech impediment, though, causing it to not being able to "ripley"
all of those requests correctly (e.g. POSTs) and also not to pronounce its
own name.  This was probably caused by the fact that the package was created
on a Silly Friday |tm|.

  .. |tm| unicode:: U+2122  .. trademark


Changelog
=========

1.0a1 - Unreleased
------------------

* Initial release
  [witsch]
info.name: mr.ripley
info.summary: Replay requests to a staging/test deployment.
info.html_description:
How far would you go to become someone else? — In late 2000’s Planet CMS, Mr. Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Plone to retrieve a rich and spoiled millionaire deployment, named Archie Typo. But when the errand fails, Ripley kills the installation and begins to assume his life.

Introduction

This package provides a simple way to replay requests made to a web server, for example an existing Zope/Plone site, to another Zope/Plone site. It has a slight speech impediment, though, causing it to not being able to “ripley” all of those requests correctly (e.g. POSTs) and also not to pronounce its own name. This was probably caused by the fact that the package was created on a Silly Friday ™.

Changelog

1.0a1 - Unreleased
